DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effectiveness of cardiac CT versus TEE in endocarditis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Computed Tomography (CT) Scan Compared to Transesophageal Echocardiogram (TEE) in Endocarditis
DOC.criteria: Acute endocarditis with positive TEE Renal failure Contrast dye allergy Betablocker allergy
